description: 过去进行时表示过去某个时间点正在进行的动作

basic_rules: 动词-ing变化规则与现在进行时相同
usage_cases: 表示过去某个时间点正在进行的动作：I was reading a book at 8:00 last night.
表示过去某个时间段正在进行的动作：They were playing football all afternoon yesterday.
表示故事发生的背景：The sun was shining. Birds were singing.
time_adverbs: at + 具体时间点：at 7:00 yesterday, at that moment
when + 一般过去时：when I arrived, when the phone rang
while + 过去进行时：while I was doing homework
common_errors: I was read a book. (错误) → I was reading a book. (正确)
They were play football. (错误) → They were playing football. (正确)
He was not watch TV. (错误) → He was not watching TV. (正确)
usage_tips: 过去进行时强调动作的进行性
常与一般过去时连用，表示一个动作发生时另一个动作正在进行
注意be动词的过去式形式

basic_usage: I was doing my homework when the phone rang.
She was cooking dinner at 6:00 yesterday.
They were playing basketball all afternoon.
What were you doing at this time yesterday?
He wasn't watching TV when I called him.
We were having dinner while they were studying.
The children were sleeping when their parents came home.
It was raining when I left the office.
She was writing a letter all morning.
Were you listening to the teacher when he asked the question?
with_time_expressions: I was studying at 8:00 last night.
She was working all day yesterday.
They were playing football the whole afternoon.
We were watching TV when the power went out.
He was reading a book at that moment.
with_when_while: I was reading when you called.
While I was cooking, the phone rang.
She was sleeping when I arrived.
While they were playing, it started to rain.
He was working when the boss came in.
negative_sentences: We weren't studying at that time.
He wasn't sleeping when I called.
